segments.text: I notice a boy precariously perched on a two-step stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a thrill in his daring attempt, and I can't help but smile at his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I feel a knot form in my stomach as I see the stool wobble beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could tumble backward onto that slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, eagerly reaching up with an open palm, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret heist is both adorable and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR
